name: Rapid Reheat
description:
In Rapid Reheat, you must throw colour-coded meals into matching microwaves as fast as possible. See how many meals you can reheat before the timer runs out! But make sure the food doesn't hit the floor... that's icky!

Controls

Aim - WASD, Arrow Keys, or Left Stick

Shoot - Spacebar, Xbox A button

Pause - P, Xbox Options button

Use mouse for menu buttons
